title: WTB: T206 Cobb Bat On or Red Portrait PSA 1

posts.post_title: WTB: T206 Cobb Bat On or Red Portrait PSA 1
posts.post_content:
Hi,

Looking for a bat on or red portrait in PSA 1-1.5-2.  Please let me know what you want for it.

Can pay by personal check, mo, or PayPal "gift."

Thanks.
Would also go for a presentable PSA 1.

Found a bat off.  Thanks everyone.  

Now need a bat off and red portrait in PSA 1-1.5-2 with good eye appeal.  

Thanks a lot.
